::KitKat::

"Good, thank you for your help Drillbit."

She looked at the ship plans for the Cybertron fire and the Iron Fist.
She didn't have a plan of attack, but she felt with the other bots 
involved, one plan would emerge that would be successful. 

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> "Ok, I'll be back." He said to KitKat. He then walked out of her 
room,
> and back too where Time Bomb, Land Mine, and Terrorsaur were.
> "Hey, KitKat wants to have a briefing in her room. It's about the
> "secret" mission." He said, as he headed back to her room.
> "Ok, they should be coming, soon enough." He said as he entered the
> room.
